content.new:
Deadline: June 1st.

Required:

* Docker improvements:

    ☐ Improve development workflow. Issue #71.

    ☐ Configure automatic builds. Issue #69.

* Issues:

    ☐ Ocean reflects the laser beams. Issue #29.

    ☐ Wave physical and rendering synchronization. Issue #23.

    ☐ Symbols do not appear in the images.

* Scoring plugins: 

    ☐ Add functionality to detect WAM-V collisions.

* Competition infrastructure:

    ☐ Support the ability to specify task parameters via YAML file.

    ☐ Docker setup for running a competition with multiple teams, tasks and runs.

    ☐ Release 1.1.X ROS packages.

    ☐ Release 1.1.X Docker images.

* Refinements:

    ☐ Improve wind model.

    ☐ Improve buoyancy model.

    ☐ Create nice sensor meshes.

    ☐ Add time incentive to scoring of Navigation task. Issue #65.

    ☐ USV dynamics modifications. Issue #57.

* Documentation and tutorials:

    ☐ Review tutorials after 1.1.X release.

    ☐ New tutorial describing how to run a competition locally.
